cves.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Emit Informatics and Communication Technologies Industry and Trade Ltd. Co. DIGITA Efficiency Management System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects DIGITA Efficiency Management System: through 03022026. 
NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

affected.vendor: Emit Informatics and Communication Technologies Industry and Trade Ltd. Co.

problemType: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')

cves.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Karel Electronics Industry and Trade Inc. ViPort allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ViPort: through 23012026.

affected.vendor: Karel Electronics Industry and Trade Inc.

problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
